Race.SpecificTitle: PW Hospital Service District No. 1 -- 8.00 Mills Renewal - BOC - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Parishwide Hospital Service District No. 1 Proposition
(Renewal)
Race.FullText: Shall the Morehouse Parish Hospital Service District No. 1, State of Louisiana (the "District"), be authorized to renew the levy and collection of a special tax of eight (8.00) mills on the dollar on all the property subject to taxation in the District (an estimated $1,825,657 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the Tax for an entire year), for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2022 to and including the year 2031, for the purpose of operating and maintaining hospital facilities within said District?
